Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Tested this test case in 2.0 kafka to raft with minimum number of channels. Observed some minor changes required in raft migration scripts. Submitting change to gerrit and add this test case to the system testsuite.

Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: As part of backlog grooming closing issue as stale. Issue can be reopened in the future.
